figure.figDesc: Bodies moved to the Jeonnam province office
figure.head: (촬영자의 기억)전라남도청과 경찰국 사이의 공간이다. 신원이 확인된 시체의 관은 태극기로 덮었다.
(photographer's memory)It's a place between the Jeonnam province office and the police station. The coffin of the identified corpse was covered with a Taegeukgi.
figure.author: 나경택
